version.name: Get employment status
version.description: Checks the employment status of an individual in a payroll scheme.

param.name: empref
param.value: A valid (URL encoded) employer reference for the PAYE scheme.

param.name: nino
param.value: A valid National Insurance Number (nino) for the individual being checked.

param.name: fromDate
param.value: Starting date of the period to check employment for.

param.name: toDate
param.value: Ending date of the period to check employment for.

field.name: empref
field.description: The PAYE Reference for the employer. This will be the same as provided in the URL.

field.name: nino
field.description: The NINO of the individual being checked. This will be the same as provided in the URL.

field.name: fromDate
field.description: The start date of the range the check should be made for.

field.name: toDate
field.description: The end date of the range the check should be made for.

field.name: employed
field.description: Whether or not the individual was employed in the scheme at any time with the date range.
